commands.example: Right-click item in inventory or use toolbar slot
Press G key, assign to Consumables category toolbar slot
Quick healing during combat or after damage
Use Anti-Radiation MedKit for radiation exposure

setup: Medkit: +3 health over time, single use
Anti-Radiation: 100% radiation reduction + 10min immunity
Cannot use multiple medkits simultaneously
Assign to toolbar for quick access
Food: Various meal types with +3 health
Cosmic Coffee: +3 health, purchase only from Dispensers
Clang Cola: Special drink with health benefits
Food consumption enabled in World Settings
Oxygen Bottle: Refills suit oxygen reserves
Hydrogen Bottle: Refills jetpack fuel
Auto-consumed when carried in inventory
Refillable at Medical Rooms with gas supply
Medkits for health restoration
Powerkits for suit energy restoration
Gas bottles for life support and mobility
Quick access via toolbar for combat
Health: Medkits and food items
Energy: Powerkits and charging sources
Life support: Oxygen and hydrogen bottles
Emergency: Anti-radiation and backup supplies

validation_rules: Most consumables fit through small conveyor ports
Single-use items are consumed when used
Health effects do not stack (one medkit at a time)
Food requires Food Consumption enabled in settings
Gas bottles auto-refill suit when carried
Some items only obtainable from Trading Outposts
Crafting requires appropriate assembler and materials
Toolbar assignment for quick access during emergencies

common_failures.cause: Food Consumption disabled or already at full health
common_failures.solution: Enable Food Consumption in settings or use when health low

common_failures.cause: Missing materials or wrong assembler type
common_failures.solution: Gather required materials and use appropriate assembler

common_failures.cause: Empty gas bottles or no automatic consumption
common_failures.solution: Ensure bottles are full and carried in character inventory

commands.example: Monitor health, energy, and gas levels in HUD
Interact with Medical Room or Survival Kit
Press I key to manage 400L character inventory
Use Medical Room booth for appearance changes

setup: Health: Damaged by weapons, falls, radiation
Suit Energy: Powers tools and HUD systems
Oxygen: Essential for survival in vacuum/toxic atmosphere
Hydrogen: Fuel for jetpack mobility
Medical Room: Fast healing, energy, gas refill
Survival Kit: Slower healing, energy, gas refill
Cockpit/Seat: Energy recharge only (no health/gas)
Cryo Chamber: Gas refill only (no health/energy)
Critical health: Use medkits immediately
Low oxygen: Find pressurized area or refill
No jetpack fuel: Find hydrogen source or surface
Suit power: Recharge at any powered seat
Prioritize essential items: tools, weapons, consumables
Manage ore and material storage efficiently
Use ship storage for bulk items
Keep emergency supplies always available
F3 key for player trading
Empty hand (0 key) for interactions
Respawn at owned Medical Room/Survival Kit
Backspace for emergency suicide/respawn

validation_rules: Oxygen essential in vacuum and toxic atmospheres
Suit energy powers all character systems
Magnetic boots work only on block surfaces
Fuel consumption scales with gravity strength

common_failures.cause: Health, oxygen, or critical system failure
common_failures.solution: Monitor vitals and use appropriate consumables/facilities

common_failures.cause: No jetpack fuel or magnetic boot attachment
common_failures.solution: Refuel jetpack or find surface for magnetic boots

common_failures.cause: Jetpack fuel depleted far from ship
common_failures.solution: Always monitor fuel, use inertial dampeners to coast
